channel.title: Everything Punk
channel.description: This a topic about punk rock only, i wanna talk about everything punk rock, such as what are your favorite bands? Mine are: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qIYhbRiuVK0]MSI- Shut Me Up[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dM6elRs7F5k]MSI- Straight To Video[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7pE8ReA5cn4&feature=relmfu]Sum 41- The Hell Song[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sT0g16_LQaQ&feature=related]Blink 182- Dammit[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xat1GVnl8-k&feature=related]Bloodhound Gang- The Bad Touch (idk if it's punk or not :/)[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5qBiuIR7ig]Iggy Pop Feat. Sum 41- Little Know it All[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nzY2Qcu5i2A]The Offspring- Prettyy Fly for a White Guy[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JzAektg101M]Dope- You Spin Me Right Round[/url] ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

item.title: Everything Punk
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Meh, screw your newpunk, or whatever that is.

The real stuff:
Misfits
Dead Kennedys
The Clash
The Ramones
Bad Religion (The’re newer, but they still have the good classic punk sound.)
Rise Against

Read full topic

item.title: Everything Punk
item.dc:creator: @mcbeans mcbeans
item.description:
@mcbeans wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:7, topic:408075”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=509358.msg3695565#msg3695565 date=1312408272]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=509358.msg3695516#msg3695516 date=1312406856]

This a topic about punk rock only, i wanna talk about everything punk rock, such as what are your favorite bands?
Mine are:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
MSI- Shut Me Up
MSI- Straight To Video
Sum 41- The Hell Song
Blink 182- Dammit
Bloodhound Gang- The Bad Touch (idk if it’s punk or not :/)
Iggy Pop Feat. Sum 41- Little Know it All
The Offspring- Prettyy Fly for a White Guy
Dope- You Spin Me Right Round
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
[/quote]None of those bands are punk.

Anyways, i do not like punk much at all unless you count hardcore punk like: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxcJW6bs5os

umm… they’re all punk. wtf is that? that’s metal dude.

en.wikipedia.org

Punk rock

Punk rock (or "punk") is a rock music genre that developed in the mid-1970s in the United States, United Kingdom, and Australia. Rooted in 1960s garage rock and other forms of what is now known as "proto-punk" music, punk rock bands rejected perceived excesses of mainstream 1970s rock. Punk bands typically produced short or fast-paced songs, with hard-edged melodies and singing styles, stripped-down instrumentation, and often political, anti-establishment lyrics. Punk embraces a DIY ethic; many b...


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qIYhbRiuVK0 the video even says it’s punk dude.
[/quote]That’s hardcore punk, not metal.

The bands you listed are pop-punk, which isn’t really punk at all. Sex Pistols, The Ramones etc is punk.[/quote]
if it’s punk it’s punk, end of discussion.

Read full topic

Rooted in 1960s garage rock and other forms of what is now known as "proto-punk" music, punk rock bands rejected perceived excesses of mainstream 1970s rock. Punk bands typically produced short or fast-paced songs, with hard-edged melodies and singing styles, stripped-down instrumentation, and often political, anti-establishment lyrics. Punk embraces a DIY ethic; many b...


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qIYhbRiuVK0 the video even says it’s punk dude.[/quote]That’s hardcore punk, not metal.
